deep cascade model.from sentence: To address the above problems , we propose a deep cascade model which combines the advantages of both methods in a coarse - to - fine manner .

designed to.from sentence: The deep cascade model is designed to properly keep the balance between the effectiveness and efficiency .

used to.from sentence: At early stages of the model , simple features and ranking functions are used to select a candidate set of most relevant contents , filtering out the irrelevant documents and paragraphs as much as possible .

attention - based deep MRC model.from sentence: Then the selected paragraphs are passed to the attention - based deep MRC model for extracting the actual answer span at word level .

all the three tasks.from sentence: We jointly optimize all the three tasks in a unified deep MRC model , which shares some common bottom layers .

cascaded structure.from sentence: This cascaded structure enables the models to perform a coarse - to - fine pruning at different stages , better models can be learnt effectively and efficiently .

overall framework.from sentence: The overall framework of our model is demonstrated in , which consists of three modules : document retrieval , paragraph retrieval and answer extraction .

input.takes: question and a collection of raw documents

first module.from sentence: The first module takes the question and a collection of raw documents as input .

module.from sentence: The module at each subsequent stage consumes the output from the previous stage , and further prunes the documents , paragraphs and answer spans given the question .

preliminary filter.to discard: most of the irrelevant documents or paragraphs

ranking function.from sentence: The ranking function is first used as a preliminary filter to discard most of the irrelevant documents or paragraphs , so as to keep our framework efficient .

extraction function.deal with: auxiliary document and paragraph extraction tasks
extraction function.from sentence: The extraction function is then designed to deal with the auxiliary document and paragraph extraction tasks , which is jointly optimized with the final answer extraction module for better extraction performance .

document extraction and paragraph extrac.from sentence: To better support the answer extraction , we also introduce the document extraction and paragraph extraction as two auxiliary tasks , which helps to quickly narrow down the entire search space .
